segments.text: Good afternoon . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is it possible for me to buy some RIB at this counter ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course , that's no problem at all .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a relief ! I was a little worried about it ; I left England in a bit of a hurry .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much would you like to change ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'm only here for 3 days , so I think 500 GAP should be plenty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please fill in this exchange form , and I'll need to see your passport , and sign here . That's the money and your passport back . Of course , if you don't spend all of it , you can come back and we'd be happy to buy the local currency back from you .
segments.speaker: S1
